description: This file implements the core functions for the Slap Access Manager Object within the Service Logic Aggregation Plane (SLAP) system. It includes create, remove, enroll, and initialize functions, as well as a detailed setup for interface structures related to access management, object creation, and environment control.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SlapAmoCreate(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Constructs and initializes a new Slap Access Manager Object, setting up its core properties and interface functions.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapAmoRemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Destroys the Slap Access Manager Object, freeing associated resources and memory.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapAmoEnrollObjects(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Enrolls required sub-objects such as interface structures, environment controllers, and proxies, initializing their configurations.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapAmoInitialize(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Initializes the core properties and function pointers of the Slap Access Manager Object, including setting default property values.
